text: Charles Douglas "Doug" Cochran (July 4, 1941 – October 1, 2012) was a United States Army Colonel. Cochran was awarded the Bronze Star for his service during the Vietnam War. After the war he served nearly three decades as a Tactical Officer for the Army Signal Corps and later as Vice Director of the United States Space Command. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2012 deaths Category:United States Army colonels Category:American army personnel of the Vietnam War
title: Charles Douglas Cochran
